document_data.name: Rassatan
document_data.mainbody: '''Rassatan''' was a city in [[Samarach]], also known as ''The City of Gilded Pearls'', found on [[Rassatan Bay]], in the foothills of the [[Sanrach Mountains]].
document_data.Description:
The city of Rassatan was situated on the steep cliffs of the bowl-shaped Rassatan Bay that gave the settlement its name.

Most buildings and habitats in Rassatan were carved into the walls of the basin. A typical home was a burrow with its entrance on the city's terraced walls.
document_data.Trade: Rassatan's main export was the golden [[pearl]]s of the highest quality in the entire [[Faer√ªn]]. The pearls were grown in the city's famed and abundant [[oyster]] beds at the bottom of Rassatan Bay.
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[Forgotten Pearl]], a lively inn and tavern open to the visitors of Rassatan.
*Shrine of [[Waukeen]], a humble but prosperous shrine constructed after the goddess's return to the planes from imprisonment in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
*[[Phelpar]], a [[wizard]] who feuded with [[Selvar]] of [[Taruin]], who lived some time before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Redfeyer]], a street performer who ventured into the [[Singing Caverns]] east of Rassatan and barely scraped with his life in the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
